data.title: Is Devon Aoki's husband James Bailey? Everything we know
data.meta_description: Are you interested in Devon Aoki's husband information? Check out this article to learn more about James Bailey's early life, career, business ventures and family.
data.text:
Devon Aoki and James Bailey began living their dream young; they got engaged in their late 20s, and both had successful careers. To date, people are still happy for them and consider them a total power couple. But who is Devon Aoki's husband, James Bailey, and what does he do?

James Bailey who preferred living a quiet life, caught the media attention when he married Devon Aoki, a model and actress. They have been together for over a decade and have four children.

James Bailey profile summary

Full nameJames BaileyGenderMaleDate of birthAugust 3, 1985Age38 years old (as of 2023)Zodiac signVirgoPlace of birthCambridge, MassachusettsCurrent residenceBrentwood, CaliforniaNationalityAmericanEthnicityWhiteReligionChristianitySexual orientationStraightMarital statusMarriedWifeDevon AokiChildrenFourProfessionFinancierNet worth$4 million

Who is James Bailey?

James Bailey was born in Boston, Massachusetts on August 3, 1985. The ace swimmer attended Shady Hill School and later joined Harvard for a business and economics-related course. His father is the cofounder of Cambridge Associates, which advises college endowment and more.

What does James Bailey do for a living?

James Bailey began his career at Accel Partners, where he spent around three months. He then joined the Highland Consumer Fund (2008 – 2010). James was appointed as the private equity analyst of TA Associates, a billion-dollar Boston-based private equity firm.

In addition, he was the founder and managing director of Velos Partners, a venture funding company in Los Angeles.

James Bailey's net worth

According to various sources, James Bailey has a net worth of about $4 million. He has achieved this wealth from his outstanding career and other investments.

Who is Devon Aoki's husband?

Is Devon Aoki still married to James Bailey? Devon Aoki and Devon Bailey are still married and have one son and three daughters. In 2009, Devon retired from full-time acting to focus on motherhood. In the 2018 spring, Devon Aoki's daughter, Alessandra, appeared in Guess Kids' advertising campaign.

The couple and their family live in their Brentwood home, which they jointly bought in 2014 for $5 million.

Quick facts about James Baily

Is Devon Aoki still married to James Bailey? Yes, Devon Aoki is still married to James Bailey, and they share four children: one son and three daughters.

What does James Bailey do for a living? James Bailey is a financier by profession.

Why did Devon Aoki stop acting? Devon Aoki quit full-time acting in 2009 to devote her time to family.

Is James Bailey married? Yes, James Bailey married Devon Aoki in 2011. Devon is an American model and actress.

Why is Devon Aoki famous? Devon Aoki is considered an icon in the fashion industry by models. In 2017, Dominic Cadogan referred to her as a cult model.

How is Devon Aoki related to Steve Aoki? Actress Devon Aoki is Steve’s half-sister.

How did Devon Aoki get into modelling? Devon started her modelling career in the late 90s after being discovered at a party in Los Angeles. She quickly rose to fame, becoming one of the most sought-after models in the industry.

Final word on James Bailey

Devon Aoki's husband, James Bailey, is a successful financier and businessperson. He married actress Devon Aoki in 2011, and they have four children: one son and three daughters. To date, they're still considered a power couple and have a huge fan following.
